Items.Title: Application no. C 090366 PCQ submitted by the Department of Transportation and the Department of Citywide Administrative Services, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the site selection and acquisition of property located at 130-31 Northern Boulevard (Block 1791, Lots 52 and 68) , for use as an asphalt plant.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
